bibl.title: The Holy Trinity Monastery in Old Dongola.
bibl.note: Présente quelques objets inscrits, ainsi que des inscriptions (principalement en copte) peintes sur les parois.

bibl.title: Between the Cataracts. Proceedings of the 11th Conference for Nubian Studies, Warsaw University, 27 August - 2 September 2006. Part One. Main Papers

bibl.seg: Stefan Jakobielski, The Holy Trinity Monastery in Old Dongola.

Włodzimierz Godlewski & Adam Łajtar (edd.), Between the Cataracts. Proceedings of the 11th Conference for Nubian Studies, Warsaw University, 27 August - 2 September 2006. Part One. Main Papers = PAM. Supplement Series. 2.1 (Warsaw, 2008) pp. 283-302, 24 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Présente quelques objets inscrits, ainsi que des inscriptions (principalement en copte) peintes sur les parois.
